description:
I met Pete on a road trip recently. When I first saw him, he looked very familiar to me but I just couldn't put my finger on it.

It drove me crazy through the whole shoot... you know that feeling, like you've met someone before.

It wasn't until I was editing the video that I realized... this guy looks like he could be Sarah Jessica Parker's (from "Sex and the City") brother. They have exactly the same eyes and similar features.

He wanted to do an adult video because he's kind of a porn hound and he's always wanted to be in one.
title: Pete
